description.raw:
The Move To feature moves the user camera in the 3D scene to the selected entity.

To use: Right click on a model in the 3D scene or entity tree and select move to.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3011493744-move_to.gif)
‌

The context menu is implemented as a QML module that’s used by both the scene3d and entity\_tree plugin.

TODOs:

* The Visual class in ign-rendering currently does not have a BoundingBox\(\) function that’s needed for adjusting the final camera position so that the entire model fits in the camera view. The bounding box is hard coded to \[1, 1, 1\] for now. Need to add this function in ign-rendering3
* A `MoveToHelper` class is added in scene3d plugin. Its functionality should be ported to the rendering::Camera class in ign-rendering3
description.html:
The Move To feature moves the user camera in the 3D scene to the selected entity.

To use: Right click on a model in the 3D scene or entity tree and select move to.

‌

The context menu is implemented as a QML module that’s used by both the scene3d and entity_tree plugin.

TODOs:

  • The Visual class in ign-rendering currently does not have a BoundingBox() function that’s needed for adjusting the final camera position so that the entire model fits in the camera view. The bounding box is hard coded to [1, 1, 1] for now. Need to add this function in ign-rendering3
  • A MoveToHelper class is added in scene3d plugin. Its functionality should be ported to the rendering::Camera class in ign-rendering3
